REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to eligibility requirements for rent increase exemptions for persons with disabilities
Summary: Relates to eligibility requirements for rent increase exemptions for persons with disabilities; includes children who qualify as a person with a disability.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-601, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to eligibility requirements for rent increase exemptions for persons with disabilities
